The Features That Set Paint Art Tab Apart:
1. Clean New Tab Look
We understand the importance of simplicity and aesthetics in your browsing experience. Paint Art Tab offers a clean and minimalist new tab page, free from clutter and distractions. No more confusing menus or jumbled icons – just a serene, spacious backdrop that clears your mind.

Access the websites you love quickly and effortlessly with Paint Art Tab's popular useful links. Your most-visited websites are just a click away, saving you time and making your browsing more efficient.
4. Convenient Web Search provided by Microsoft Bing
We've partnered with Bing to offer you a convenient web search experience right from your new tab.
